meta.job_title: Digital Product Manager - Website & Mobile App

duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, develop, execute, and optimize the Lottery’s websites and mobile apps.
Analyze strategy's effectiveness and monitor product health.
Work with various stakeholders and solicit support with business initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, preferably with a specialization in marketing, digital product design, computer science, information technology, engineering, or a related field.
